name: Scallop
description:
Scallop is an innovative fintech decentralized ecosystem built to offer users a faster and more efficient way to securely manage crypto and fiat currencies in a single place. Scallop is a 
robust platform that combines decentralized financial services with banking features such as bank accounts, cards, remittance and much more - to promote the general usage of crypto in daily life. Scallopâ€™s 
mission is to bring digital assets into mainstream use and accelerate the transition to a more equitable and decentralised ecosystem.
